Html:
just downloaded the newest, latest and greatest. I went to delete the default poll and recieved an error. PollControl.vb:150, the for each loop. If answertable is nothing, it bombs. I was tossed in a simple If Not(AnswerTable is Nothing) around those loops (there's two within that method) along with the count around 155.

can someone verify this? I didn't want to add it as a bug until I was sure.

re-create conditions -- new install, log in as admin, delete the poll, go back to the main page.
